      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • setSnakePos

      public GameManagerBuilder setSnakePos(Point pos)
      (OPTIONAL) Sets the initial snake position The snake position must go with the snake's size, having to choose a valid position on the map to be the center of the snake For example a size 3 snake can be positioned in 3n + 1. a snake of size 2 can be positioned in 2n + 0.5. If not set the snake position will be chosen at random
      Parameters:
      pos - the initial snake position (can be null)
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • setSnakeDir

      public GameManagerBuilder setSnakeDir(Direction dir)
      (OPTIONAL) Sets the initial snake direction If not set the snake direction will be chosen at random
      Parameters:
      dir - the initial snake direction (can be null)
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • setSnakeSize

      public GameManagerBuilder setSnakeSize(int size)
      Sets the size of a snake unit
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the snake
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • setFoodPos

      public GameManagerBuilder setFoodPos(Point pos)
      (OPTIONAL) Sets the initial food position The food position must go with the food's size, having to choose a valid position on the map to be the center of the food For example a size 3 food can be positioned in 3n + 1. a food of size 2 can be positioned in 2n + 0.5. If not set the food position will be chosen at random
      Parameters:
      pos - the position to spawn the food in
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • setFoodSize

      public GameManagerBuilder setFoodSize(double size)
      Sets the food size. Must be smaller or equal to the snake's size
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the food
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public GameManagerBuilder setUpdateMethod(GameEngineFlags.UpdateMethod method)
      Sets the update method for the game. (if each game cycle should be cycled automatically, through input or through code)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • addObstacle

      public GameManagerBuilder addObstacle(Polygon obstacle)
      (OPTIONAL) Adds a static obstacle to the game map. Can be called multiple times.
      Parameters:
      obstacle - the obstacle's shape
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • addObstacle

      public GameManagerBuilder addObstacle(Polygon obstacle, VirtualPoint anchor, float speed)
      (OPTIONAL) Adds a dynamic obstacle to the game. The obstacle will rotate around the anchor point with the given speed. Can be called multiple times.
      Parameters:
      obstacle - the obstacle's shape
      anchor - the point to rotate the obstacle around (can be null)
      speed - the speed the obstacle should rotate around the anchor
      Returns:
      the GameManagerBuilder instance

    • build

      public GameManager build() throws SnakeGameException
      Builds the GameManager, and by consequence the game.
      Returns:
      the GameManager built
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException - if there were invalid parameters or initialization failed
